1446490.name: Tree Trunk Brook - Suggested donation
1446490.description:
Tree Trunk Brook is 100% free. Like the trails and parks that inspired us, anyone and everyone can visit whenever they’d like. If you download the base game, you can experience our game in its entirety.



The purpose of this DLC is to provide a way for people to be generous and to support the developers. Through this game we share our heart, love of nature, and vision of kindness to strangers. The game is fully complete on its own and no gameplay content is locked behind the DLC.

However, by supporting, you do get a couple of decorative items:
  • A special badge on the title screen.
  • A little pin that your hiker wears on her shirt.



This donation DLC has a suggested amount, but will occasionally be on sale.

As always, thank you for your support. We know it may be hard sometimes, but please find a way to get outside and enjoy your local natural landscape.
